required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Dermacyd PH_DETINLYN Tangerine Mix (Lactic Acid) - Safety.
clinical_study.official_title: Safety Dermatological Evaluation: Genital Mucous Irritation - Product Tested: Dermacyd PH_DETINLYN Tangerine Mix (Lactic Acid).

brief_summary.textblock: To prove the safety of the gynaecological formulation in normal conditions of use.

primary_outcome.measure: The absence of irritation and the good acceptability will be evaluated using one specific scale which describes the intensity of the reaction.
primary_outcome.time_frame: From the treatment start to the end of the study
